sentences: Parties discussed the Co-Chairs draft conclusions paragraph-by-paragraph.
The EU and JAPAN, opposed by the G-77/CHINA, reiterated their request to delete a sentence calling for information exchange on ways to minimize the adverse effects of response measures.
Following discussions, the EU suggested replacing the sentence with a general reference to decision 13/CP.7 (P&Ms).
The G-77/CHINA, opposed by the EU and US, suggested replacing the sentence and surrounding text with a specific paragraph from decision 13/CP.7.

Following informal discussions, Co-Chair Greg Terrill proposed new conclusions noting the continued importance of implementing decision 13/CP.7, and agreeing to reconsider this agenda item at SBSTA-19.
